about_the_game:
Welcome to Your Kingdom In another World!


Get ready for an epic journey into a vibrant voxel world full of mysteries and challenges! You are transported to an unknown kingdom, procedurally generated with each new game, guaranteeing a unique experience with each game. Here, the survival and prosperity of your colony directly depends on your management and strategy skills.

Main Features


Procedurally Generated World: Each match presents a new world with distinct challenges and features. Explore diverse biomes, discover rare resources and adapt your strategy to each new environment.

Complex Colony Management: Meet your colonists' needs, such as happiness, sleep, and health, while expanding your colony. Maintain order and well-being to avoid declines in productivity and health problems.

Zombie Threats: Defend your colony from hordes of zombies that eventually emerge. Fortify your defenses and prepare your colonists to survive these terrible nights.

Winter Preparation: Stock up on resources and strengthen your colony to survive the harsh winters. Plan ahead and keep your colonists warm and fed to avoid disasters.

Day and Night Cycle: Manage your activities based on the day and night cycle. Take advantage of daylight to build and explore, and prepare for threats that emerge at night.

Health and Sanitation: Prevent disease outbreaks by keeping the colony clean and free of trash and decaying bodies. Effective sanitation systems are essential to the health of your settlers.

Technology and Research: Discover and develop new technologies to improve your colony's efficiency and unlock new building and defense capabilities.

Extensive Customization: Each colony you build can be customized to the extreme, from architecture to survival strategies, offering an always fresh and challenging game.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 ou superior
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
